VARDESC: Not including yourself does anyone who lives with you now do any of the following? Choose all that apply.
column18: 2 = Use e-cigarettes or other electronic nicotine products
column19: 5 = Smoke traditional cigars, cigarillos, or filtered cigars

column25: 11 = Use nicotine pouches (such as Zyn, on!, or Velo)
column26: 12 = Use other types of oral nicotine products (such as Velo lozenges, Rogue tablets, Lucy gum, or Pixotine toothpicks)
column27: 9 = Use any other form of tobacco
column28: 10 = No one who lives with me now uses any form of tobacco
